| HistoryText             = Nothing is known about the Guardian Clan, composed of Neo who retained his powers after the [[Decimation]] when many others did not. Hearing of the birth of the [[Hope Summers (Earth-616)|Messiah-child]], Stare led the powered members of the Clan in an attack on the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] in hopes of receiving answers. 

Reacting to Neo's agression, the [[Evolutionaries]] arrived and terminated the Guardian Clan, and then every last Neo on Earth, followed shortly thereafter, to protect [[Homo Superior|mutantkind]].
